SELECT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgName ,a.ifcgNameEng ,(select count(aa.ifcdSeq) from infrCode aa where 1=1 and aa.ifcdDelNy = 0 and aa.ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq) as xifcdSeqCount ,a.ifcgUseNy ,a.ifcgOrder ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime
ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq DESC

SELECT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgSeqAnother ,a.ifcgName ,a.ifcgNameEng ,a.ifcgUseNy ,a.ifcgOrder ,a.ifcgReferenceV1 ,a.ifcgReferenceV2 ,a.ifcgReferenceV3 ,a.ifcgReferenceV4 ,a.ifcgReferenceI1 ,a.ifcgReferenceI2 ,a.ifcgReferenceI3 ,a.ifcgReferenceI4 ,a.ifcgDesc ,a.ifcgDelNy FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
